description: An improvised magazine for a vehicle mounted weapon.  A simple metal box with some plastic guide rails, it acts as a gravity fed hopper to drop a small round shot into the weapon's chamber below.  It is not very reliable, but quick to reload.

An improvised magazine for a vehicle mounted crossbow.  A simple metal box with some plastic guide rails, it acts as a gravity fed hopper to drop a crossbow bolt into the weapon below.  It is awkward to reload and not especially reliable.

An improvised magazine for a vehicle mounted weapon.  A simple metal box with some plastic guide rails, it acts as a gravity fed hopper to drop a heavy canister into the weapon below.  It is awkward to reload and not especially reliable.

An improvised magazine for a vehicle mounted weapon.  A simple metal box with some plastic guide rails, it acts as a gravity fed hopper to drop a small round shot into the weapon's chamber below.  It is not very reliable, but quick to reload.
